about_the_game:
ATTENTION PICKPOCKET
An engaging game of strategy and stealth that thrusts you into a world where you must choose a side: will you be a cunning thief or a brave volunteer? Your choice will determine your objective and how you interact with your surroundings.

Game Modes
1. Thief: (Currently the only game mode)

Objectives:

  • Steal as many items as possible before getting caught.
  • Deliver items to hideouts to convert them into money.
  • Other objectives may be implemented in future updates.

Game Mechanics:

  • Carefully plan your moves, choosing the right moment to act.
  • Watch out for the eyes of other passengers and cameras.
  • Other mechanics may be implemented in future updates.

ATTENTION PICKPOCKET is a dynamic game, constantly enriched with updates that modify gameplay and introduce new maps and scenarios. Each update will bring new challenges and opportunities for both thieves and volunteers, ensuring a fresh and stimulating gaming experience.

Future Map Updates: Discover new Subway station designed by the community.

Gameplay Changes: Expect new mechanics and tools to improve your stealth or surveillance skills.

Special Events: Participate in time-limited events with unique rules and special rewards, hoping that the CIGGIEL doesn't send us a letter too!
